channel.title: FreeBSD on Chris Titus Tech | Tech Content Creator
channel.description: Recent content in FreeBSD on Chris Titus Tech | Tech Content Creator

item.title: Install Plex plugin in FreeNAS
item.description: This is an in-depth installation and configuration of the Plex plugin in FreeNAS 11.2. I detail the installation of plex on FreeNAS Jail and configuration of using a share as a Plex mount point.

item.title: How to Setup FreeNAS 11
item.description: This article goes over how to setup FreeNAS 11 and configure it. These are the basic steps so you can have a reliable network storage at your house.
